participant_1.background:
My sister is a pole dancer.
My favorite color is red.
I enjoy listening to classical music.
I can drive a tractor.
I am a christian.

participant_2.background:
I just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.
My favorite color is orange.
I have a pet fish.
I like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset.
I turned 18 years old yesterday.

content.text: Hi, I'm [user 1's name]. What's your name?
I'm [user 2's name]. Nice to meet you.
Same here. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, I just turned 18 yesterday, and I have a pet fish.
That's cool. I like to go hiking too. I have a sister who's a pole dancer, and I love listening to classical music.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been to a pole dancing show. I love orange, and I just broke up with my boyfriend two months ago.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll find someone new soon. What's your favorite thing about being 18?
I can finally vote, and I can drink in public.
That's cool. I like being able to vote too. I can drive a tractor, and my favorite color is red.
Oh, that's cool. I've never driven a tractor before. I'm a Christian, and I like to read books.
I like to read too. I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too. We should hang out sometime.
That sounds like fun. I'm free on Friday.
Me too. Let's go hiking together.
That sounds great. I'll see you on Friday.
